attributes.action: reduce the fuel duty and suspend any further increases in duty for petrol and diesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a war veteran and am on a war pension therefore rely on my car to get around as i have difficulty in walking, and now after doing my duty for my country i find that i am being priced of the road by a greedy government trying to rectify its financial mistakes by raping the wallet of the innocent motorist and feel this is unaceptable and i am not the only veteram in this position...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
